name: Disney's Goof Troop
overview: Set sail for adventure with the Goof Troop! It's a great day for fishing and Goofy just caught a boatload of trouble! Pete and PJ have been kidnapped by pirates and Goofy and Max must row to their rescue. It's hilarious hijinks on the high seas as they trail the pirates to Spoonerville Island and bumble through the jungle to free their pals from the notorious Keelhaul Pete! Get on board with Goofy and Max as they race ashore to do battle with boards of burly buccaneers! Dodge exploding cannonballs and search dingy dungeons for clues to the pirates lair. Dig for buried treasure and solve perplexing puzzles to gain the keys needed to enter the pirate's stronghold. Sneak inside and you'll face Keelhaul Pete, the terror of the tropics!
